articles.author: Nora Eckert
articles.title: Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares to retire in 2026 as automaker struggles in North America - Reuters
articles.description: The confirmation of Tavares' retirement plans comes weeks after Stellantis said it was searching for his successor.

articles.author: Meghan Bartels
articles.title: Whooping Cough Is Spreading Again after Years of Relative Quiet - Scientific American
articles.description: Whooping cough, also known as pertussis, is on the rise after a lull at the beginning of the COVID pandemic
articles.content: The cacophony of coughs you’ll hear in the coming months will be caused by a mix of respiratory bugs. Some are familiar culprits—the common cold, COVID, the flu—and more recently respiratory syncytia… [+7516 chars]
